Title: Grants a total exemption from real property taxation for school tax purposes for certain persons seventy-five years of age or over
Summary: Grants a total exemption from real property taxation for school tax purposes for certain persons seventy-five years of age or over.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to granting a total exemption from real property taxation for school tax purposes for certain persons seventy-five years of age or over
